DOC.brief_title: Influence Patient-Informed Choice Novel Treatment Model LBP
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study proposal evaluate patient choice within physical therapist-led model non-specific low back pain . Evidence exist patient eager play active role decision concern health . Recent evidence research support benefit decision aide consumer , especially accurate refine specific problem patient . In proposed randomized control trial ( RCT ) , one group patient study opportunity drive choice within healthcare model ; receive useful information consequence selection . Patients receive decision make information assist making informed choice . The structured information organize know result research literature assist patient understand likely outcome condition need adequately manage care . The control group patient receive Physical therapist-directed care model presently use show success . Patient outcome involve patient self report improvement whether patient pursue care condition 1 year period time .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old mechanically producible LBP presence red flag ( i.e. , tumor , metabolic disease , RA , osteoporosis , prolonged history steroid use , etc . ) , sign consistent nerve root compression ( reproduction low back leg pain straight leg raise le 45Â° , muscle weakness involve major muscle group lower extremity , diminish low extremity muscle stretch reflex , diminish absent sensation pinprick low extremity dermatome ) . Other exclusion criterion include prior surgery lumbar spine current pregnancy .
